price: A Gospodar tvoj je neizmjerno dobar ljudima, ali većina njih nije zahvalna.
arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذُو فَضۡلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-inna rabbaka ladhū faḍlin ʿalā al-nāsi walākinna aktharahum lā yashkurūna
